channel.title: WHATWG Fullscreen API Workstream-relevant MDN issues
channel.description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by WHATWG Fullscreen API Workstream

item.title: [fullscreen] Using F11 to enter fullscreen mode doesn’t set fullscreenElement (it remains null) and document.exitFullscreen() doesn’t work
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Document/exitFullscreen

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

If you enter in fullscreen mode by using the browsers shortcuts (F11 for example), this simply doesn't work. It doesn't set the fullscreenElement, it remains null.

Specific section or headline?

What did you expect to see?

The functions working as expected even if I switch between calling the fullscreen functions though code or through browser shortcuts.

Did you test this? If so, how?

Yes..
Open the browser, press F11 and check the Document.fullscreenElement, it will be null and it should rather be set.

MDN Content page report details
  • Folder: en-us/web/api/document/exitfullscreen
  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Document/exitFullscreen
  • GitHub URL: https://github.com/mdn/content/blob/main/files/en-us/web/api/document/exitfullscreen/index.md
  • Last commit: 89c8199
  • Document last modified: 2022-02-18T09:24:31.000Z
